title: Dads, Bubs and Beer
body:
Hi everyone. Any dads in Western Sydney want to hang out - kids included - to watch SKT stomp Liquid on Sunday?

I've got a three-year-old daughter.

I'd be happy to host, but I don't know how I'm going to screen people. Any ideas?

I don't want %%%%s in my house, but I want to network with other League-loving dads.

replies.body: Nice to see I am not the only League Daddy playing here where most players are sons and daughters. GLHF.
